name: df-msub
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cmsub, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpt(s1, co(cfv(cmrex, cv(s0)), cpm, cfv(cmvar, cv(s0))), cmpt(s2, cfv(cmex, cv(s0)), cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s2)), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmrsub, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s2))))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ mSubst =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà((mREx ` s0)[p‚Ü¶](mVR ` s0))‚Ü¶(s2 ‚àà(mEx ` s0)‚Ü¶ <(1st ` s2),(((mRSubst ` s0)` s1)`(2nd ` s2))>)))
comment: Define a substitution of expressions given a mapping from variables to expressions. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2016.)
